sentences.sContent: what you long to know about a house when you put your hand on the knocker.
sentences.sContent_eng: what you long to know about a house when you put your hand on the knocker.
sentences.sCn: 当你把手放到门环上时，你能有这般了解一整座屋子吗？

sentences.sContent: Le Cabuc runs to the door, which had a very massive knocker, and knocks.
sentences.sContent_eng: Le Cabuc runs to the door, which had a very massive knocker, and knocks.
sentences.sCn: 勒·卡布克跑到楼房门前，门上有个相当大的门锤，他提起便敲。

synos.tran: 门环；敲击者；吹毛求疵的人

trans.tranOther: a piece of metal on an outside door of a house that you hit against the door to attract the attention of the people inside
